extension.summary: Fork of the ExtendedInfo script from phil65
extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions and OpenMeta for library functions.
extension.news: -[B]v.6.1.0[/B] Added "Original language" filter to videolist(Movies & TV Shows Browser).[CR] -[B]NOTE[/B] Major code changes is in the works for the next version of OpenInfo(v.7.0.0) which our focus has shifted towards to.
